nl.strohalm.cyclos.dao.groups

Interface GroupDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseDAO<Group>, DeletableDAO<Group>, InsertableDAO<Group>, UpdatableDAO<Group>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroupDAOImpl

    public interface GroupDAO
extends BaseDAO<Group>, InsertableDAO<Group>, UpdatableDAO<Group>, DeletableDAO<Group>
    Data access object interface for groups
    Author:
    rafael

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SystemGroup findByLoginPageName(java.lang.String loginPageName)
      Finds a group by it's login page name
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getGroupMemberCount()
      Returns a Map containing, as key, the group name, and as value, the member count for that group, ordered by nature (members then brokers) and name If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation, it should be wrapped by a DaoException.
      java.util.List<OperatorGroup> iterateOperatorGroups(MemberGroup memberGroup)
      Returns a list of all operator groups of all members in this group
      java.util.List<MemberGroup> listActiveMemberGroups()
      Returns a List of MemberGroups that are active (have as least one account)
      java.util.List<? extends Group> search(GroupQuery query)
      Searches groups according to the given query.

    • Method Detail

      • findByLoginPageName

        SystemGroup findByLoginPageName(java.lang.String loginPageName)
        Finds a group by it's login page name

      • getGroupMemberCount

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getGroupMemberCount()
        Returns a Map containing, as key, the group name, and as value, the member count for that group, ordered by nature (members then brokers) and name If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation, it should be wrapped by a DaoException.

      • iterateOperatorGroups

        java.util.List<OperatorGroup> iterateOperatorGroups(MemberGroup memberGroup)
        Returns a list of all operator groups of all members in this group

      • listActiveMemberGroups

        java.util.List<MemberGroup> listActiveMemberGroups()
        Returns a List of MemberGroups that are active (have as least one account)

      • search

        java.util.List<? extends Group> search(GroupQuery query)
                                       throws DaoException
        Searches groups according to the given query. Results should be ordered by name by default. If the sortByNature flag is set on the query object, then the nature (first admin, then member, then broker) plus the group name should be used to determine the ordering. If no Group can be found, returns an empty List. If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation, it should be wrapped by a DaoException.
        Throws:
        DaoException
